text: == Classification == {| align=center style="font-size: 90%; border- collapse:collapse" border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=2 |- align=center bgcolor=#98A1B2 !width=40| !width=220|Season ranking 1957 !width=55|Pt !width=40|G !width=40|W !width=40|D !width=40|L !width=40|PF !width=40|PA |- align=center style="background:#DDEEFF" | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| Olimpija ||28||18||14||0||4||1444||1129 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||25||18||12||1||5||1433||1296 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||23||18||11||1||6||1231||1164 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text- align:left;"| Ljubljana ||23||18||11||1||6||1314||1225 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text-align:left;"| BSK ||23||18||10||3||6||1310||1215 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Jugomontaža ||18||18||9||0||9||1187||1230 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Partizan ||13||18||6||1||11||1172||1182 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text- align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||11||18||5||1||12||1121||1240 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Željezničar Karlovac ||10||18||5||0||13||1137||1310 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Sloboda Tuzla ||7||18||3||1||14||1042||1300 |} The winning roster of Olimpija: * Marjan Kandus * Boris Kristančič * Ivo Daneu * Janez Škrjanc * Matija Dermastija * Miha Lokar * Bogo Debevc * Primož Brišnik * Sašo Poljšak * Peter Kralj Coach: Boris Kristančič ==Scoring leaders== # Radivoj Korać (BSK) – ___ points (29.1 ppg) # ??? # ??? == Qualification in 1958 season European competitions == FIBA European Champions Cup * Olimpija (Champions) ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
